comments:

seems that once I get this prolbem the editor no longer saves at all.  Interestingly I don't always get the NPE.  Sometimes I try to save and there is no feedback but the * is still on the editor (and there is no additional content in the file on disk )  Sometimes I do get the NPE
Just talked with Jeff and it seemed a restart fixed the problems.  Unless he (or others) run into this again, we will investigate post 3.3.
Mike, want to look at how this could happen? If you're confident that it's fixed or you just can't reproduce it... we should close.

Sure, will take a look.
The entire underlying model was rewritten for M2, so this problem won't apply anymore.  Will verify.

The simple cheat sheet editor now uses the flushModel method defined by the XML text edit operation framework (shared with manifest editor).  If that does not work we are in trouble ;)
Closing.
